title: The tvvoo bookes of Francis Bacon. Of the proficience and aduancement of learning, diuine and humane To the King.
author: Bacon, Francis, 1561-1626.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed [by Thomas Purfoot and Thomas Creede] for Henrie Tomes, and are to be sould at his shop at Graies Inne gate in Holborne,
